title: Chapter 92: Secret hand———- Kibaku Fuda
body:
Chapter 92: Secret hand———- Kibaku Fuda

Chapter 92: Secret hand———- Kibaku Fuda (Paper bomb)


Due to the Ryusa Bakuryu (Sand Tsunami) of Ren Tianyou, the surrounding terrain around them was thoroughly changed, the peoples of Ximen clan were already swallowed by this boundless sand waves and disappeared.


Standing at the edge of desert, Ren Tianyou was unceasingly scanning every place carefully using his Sharingan which was hidden underneath the mask, to guard against any sudden surprise attack. Although Ryusa Bakuryu (Sand Tsunami) was difficult to deal with, nevertheless currently he was dealing with 2 God-ranked experts, so it alone wasn’t quite enough to defeat them.


At that time, Ren Tianyou suddenly heard a sound above his head. So without even thinking, Ren Tianyou quickly jumped to the right side to dodge.


“Hong long!” An explosion sound rang out. The gold colored battle qi energy hit the place where Ren Tianyou was standing just a moment ago, and a deep hole suddenly appeared on that surface of ground. At the same time, a huge water spear was suddenly shot out from the bottom of desert, and shot towards airborne Ren Tianyou in a high speed.


Seeing water spear advancing towards him in a high speed, a light flashed in the eyes of Ren Tianyou. The attack was advancing towards him exactly when he was airborne to dodge the previous attack, now due to him being airborne he was unable to dodge this attack, one may as well say that this attack was precise to extreme. Now battling with God-ranked expert, he knew that they not only excel in strength, but their battle experience was also extremely high. As they had to pass thorough innumerable life and death battle to reach God-rank, and as for those lucky fellow who reached God-ranked without much effort, they were only part of small minority.


“Sure enough, it really is difficult to deal with them, but you are underestimating me, Ren Tianyou too much.” Looking at the Water spear which was advancing quickly towards him, Ren Tianyou made a hand seals quickly. Just after Ren Tianyou had finished making the hand seals, that water spear also hit him.


“Success.” Seeing that the water spear had hit Ren Tianyou, landing on the ground, Ximen Shu exposed a joyful smile on his face. But before he could finish smiling, Ren Tianyou who was hit in the sky suddenly turned into a log and that log dropped on the ground. And furthermore the figure of Ren Tianyou couldn’t be seen.


“What?” Seeing this circumstance, the expression of Ximen Shu was as if he had seen something unthinkable, he didn’t understand what was going on, and how could a living person change into a piece of broken wood.


At that time, Ximen Shu clearly heard a sound coming through his right side, then he immediately waved the huge sword in his right hand. ‘Ding!’ a sound of metal collision was heard, and he saw a thin needle like thing had hit his weapon, then with the pull of string, that thin needle retreated back, and a hand wearing a glove appeared out of thin air and caught this needle. Carefully looking, if this was not Ren Tianyou then who could it be.


“Are you still not coming out?” Catching the Nuibari (Needle Sword), Ren Tianyou turned his head towards the desert he created, then looking towards it, he sneered and slowly spoke.


After Ren Tianyou spoke, the sands in the middle of desert suddenly issued a round of wriggling sound, then a pothole appeared at that place, after that a huge water ball suddenly shot out from inside it, and floated in the air. Inside the water ball there were Ximen Xinbo and others who were swallowed by the sand waves.


“Didn’t expect Your Excellency actually possessed sand control special system magic arts, but did Your Excellency really believed that can wipe us out?” Floating in the air, Ximen Xinbo looked at Ren Tianyou and asked in a cold voice.


Special system, not among 7 great common element of continent, it is even more difficult to deal with compared to power of 7 great common element, so they couldn’t help but become even more serious.


“He he, want to test to understand clearly whether or not it can wipe you out?” Hearing Ximen Xinbo, Ren Tianyou didn’t deny and also didn’t affirm.


“Number two, no need to speak superfluous words with him, apparently toady is not good.” Ximen Shu flew in the sky and arrived to the side of Ximen Xinbo and said.


“In this case, we are forced to use this method.” Ximen Xinbo replied, then turned around and said to two of the five Saint-ranked bodyguards, “You two protect the juniors of our clan, and keep them safe. Remaining three accompany us to deal with him.”


“Yes sir.” ……………………….


All of them answered in a loud voice, then those 3 Sword Saint and Ximen Shu who was God-ranked warrior firmly held huge sword in their hand and rush straight towards Ren Tianyou. Only after looking at all the juniors of his clan, Ximen Xinbo said to Ximen Yue’er, “Yue’er be prepare to guard against the unexpected, and stay by my side.”


“Okay.” Ximen Yue’er replied, then took out her own magic wand from her space ring, and floated at the side of Ximen Xinbo, then stood in combat readiness.


Looking at the people of Ximen clan rushing towards him, Ren Tianyou gradually became serious, after all confronting 2 God-ranked experts, 5 Saint-ranked experts, and in addition Ximen Yue’er who was also Saint-ranked magician, and furthermore more than 10 other expert, even Ren Tianyou himself was feeling extreme pressure.


Ren Tianyou raised both his hand, and huge amount of chakra appeared from both of his hand, then the sands in front of him suddenly started to violently stir, afterwards 4 huge sand palms appeared in the sky and was about to grab 4 people.


“Nimpo——–Sabaku Hando!” (Ninja art——Desert Hands!)


“Watch out!” Seeing that a huge palm shaped sand had suddenly appeared, Ximen Shu cried out to warn others, then the huge dragon sword in his hand issued a loud dragon roar, then a large amount of gold colored energy appeared in the sky. “War dragon attack!”


“Xiu!” With a loud sound of breaking through the void, this huge light covered sword directly destroyed the sand palms and without losing its momentum, it directly flew towards the direction of Ren Tianyou.


“Dragon origin war formation———–Dragon roar!” At this time, the 3 Saint-ranked warrior simultaneously shout loudly, then their battle qi gradually rose and shine with cyan, red and blue color respectively, then gradually combined together. After that a three colored light formation appeared in the sky. In the middle of the light formation, a huge dragon made up of energy gradually appeared. Then under the control of these 3 Saint-ranked experts, this energy dragon advance towards desert palms.


‘Dragon origin war formation’ was a war formation passed down in Ximen clan. This formation could combine the energy of several people and display a powerful energy attack, could be used for both attack and defense, but it requires at least 3 people and at most only 5 people could use this formation. Therefore this formation was ‘compulsory to learn’ secret warrior skill of Ximen clan.


This energy dragon destroyed the remaining 3 sand palms just like a hot knife through the butter. Then directly advanced towards the direction of Ren Tianyou.


“Extremely capable.” Seeing his ninjutsu was directly destroyed, Ren Tianyou laughed, then immediately jumped in the air to dodge, simultaneously his right hand entered inside the ninja backpack on his right leg and took out several kunai. Then threw in towards several peoples.


“Dang”, “dang”………..several metal colliding sound rang out, as Ximen Shu and other peoples had use their weapon to block his kunai.


But after seeing his kunai were blocked, the eyes of Ren Tianyou showed a sly smiling expression, both hands attached with each other making a hand seal, he said, “ha!”


After Ren Tianyou made a hand seal, Ximen Shu and others suddenly discovered that at the handle of this hidden weapon, there were several extremely thin scrap of papers, and mysterious runs were drawn on its surface. Then these several scrap of papers suddenly ignited.


“Not good, quickly defend.” The pupil of Ximen Shu shrunk, even the pores of his body shrunk, he felt a dangerous sensation from these papers, so he immediately roared to warn others too, and simultaneously his gold colored battle qi radiance rose suddenly and sharply. At this time, several large explosion sound rang out, in the sky, Ximen Shu and several others were inside this explosion.
